response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit someone like yourself. Considering its unique features and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special price of $1,300,000. This offer reflects my desire to see the product find a home where it can truly shine and contribute positively to its future owner. I look forward to hearing your response and hope we can bring this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 1300000}
